Press OK and wait — the app will restart: .سيتم إعادة تشغيل التطبيق تلقائيًا — اضغط موافق وانتظر
Sorry, autoupdate broke, please uninstal: Gapminder Offline آسف، التحديث التلقائي كسر، الرجاء إلغاء تثبيت وتثبيت الإصدار الجديد
Please uninstall Gapminder Offline and i: Gapminder Offline الرجاء إلغاء تثبيت وتثبيت الإصدار الجديد
ddf-folder-content: DDF is a way to organise many files into a complex dataset, such as one we normally use in Gapminder Tools. You can benefit from DDF if you have a lot of indicators or if you need to add indicator descriptions and source links or if you have entity properties (like country names) or if your data has many entity sets (countries, municipalities, counties) or if your indicators are multidimensional (for example, population by country by age by gender by time is an indicator defined in 4 dimensions).
to validate the dataset and generate dat: datapackage.json للتحقق من صحة مجموعه البيانات وإنشاء
ddf-folder-warn:
Opening DDF directory was unsuccessful because the file datapackage.json is missing in it.
This file is the key to a DDF dataset. If you don’t know how to add it, see how you can generate one here:
ddf-folder-warn-2:
If your dataset doesn’t follow DDF structure or if you are
unsure what all of this means, see DDF docs here
limitation-content: Limitation: entities in the first column should match the ones already used in the chart: {{countries}} and so on... Time values should be expressed like {{timePoints}}... Observe the restrictions on column headers, as highlighted below.
Column 1: entities, Column 2: time value: العمود 1: الكيانات، العمود 2: قيم الوقت، العمود 3 وعلى: مؤشرات
columns-desc-content-time: العمود 1: الكيانات، العمود 2: مؤشرات، العمود 3 وعلى: قيم الوقت
columns-desc-content-time-values: العمود 2: مؤشرات، العمود 3 وعلى: قيم الوقت ،{{dim}} :العمود 1
Table has an extra column with nice look: الجدول يحتوي على عمود إضافي مع أسماء لطيفة في موقف
How to prepare and export a file from MS: MS Excel كيفية تحضير وتصدير ملف من
How to export a file from Google Docs: Google Docs كيفية تصدير ملف من
— We don't. Everything stays local on yo: نحن لا.  كل شيء يبقى المحلية على جهاز الكمبيوتر الخاص بك-
New chart from your data: مخطط جديد من البيانات الخاصة بك
But in this case we can't guarantee prop: ولكن في هذه الحالة لا يمكننا ضمان الأداء السليم للتطبيق
Upgrade or downgrade manually to one of: قم بالتحديث يدويًا أو تقليله إلى أحد الإصدارات التالية:
Impossible to rename folder already exis: Impossible to rename: folder "{{newFolderName}}" already exists!
Impossible to remove:folder does not exi: Impossible to remove: folder "{{folderName}}" does not exist!
bad-header-format-key: Expected "{{expectedHeaderKey}}" but found "{{existingHeaderKey}}" in the first column of the file. Importing is still possible, but the result might not be not what you expect.
bad-header-format-time: Expected "{{expectedHeaderTime}}" but found "{{existingHeaderTime}}" in the second column of the file. Importing is still possible, but the result might not be not what you expect.
bad-header-format-all: Expected "{{expectedHeaderKey}}" but found "{{existingHeaderKey}}" in the first column and expected "{{expectedHeaderTime}}" but found "{{existingHeaderTime}}" in the second column of the file. Importing is still possible, but the result might not be not what you expect.
csv-excel-empty-data: Importing is impossible due to empty data!
Bookmarks will appear here: Bookmarks will appear here. To create a bookmark, make a chart you like and click a little star in the tab head.
